description: Defines a sealed interface 'LoginIntent' representing various user actions (intents) related to login, such as email change, password change, and submit command.

classes.name: LoginIntent
classes.description: A sealed interface for login-related user intents, including email change, password change, and submission action.

methods.name: EmailChanged
methods.description: Data class representing the intent when the user changes the email input.

methods.name: PasswordChanged
methods.description: Data class representing the intent when the user changes the password input.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Object representing the intent when the user presses the login button.
